results.content: I like the way this guy codes and I really like his teaching style. The instructor is good at explaining what he is doing with his code and what Vue is doing. You understand what is going on. If you understand you remember. Some other didactic courses scratch the surface and you leave having watched them complete their examples without the first clue how to do it yourself. This is easily the best of the 3 most popular courses on Vue I have paid for.

response.content: Thank you so much, David. You made my day!
response.content_html: Thank you so much, David. You made my day!

results.content: Great course! I learned a lot about VueJS, components, data flow between components and parent and about the possibilities with Firebase. The instructor is very kind and explains things very clear. The projects are real world projects complete with auth. and user management in Firebase. I'm very new to Firebase and I had a question about connecting to Firebase and getting data and the instructor helped very quickly with a working answer. Thank you Sachin for this great course!
results.content_html: Great course! I learned a lot about VueJS, components, data flow between components and parent and about the possibilities with Firebase. The instructor is very kind and explains things very clear. The projects are real world projects complete with auth. and user management in Firebase. I'm very new to Firebase and I had a question about connecting to Firebase and getting data and the instructor helped very quickly with a working answer. Thank you Sachin for this great course!

results.content: My goal from this course was to better understand Vue to create a somewhat complex application.  Sachin provided an excellent framework and was very generous with his time in answering my Q&A.  The two main applications developed throughout this course with the Vue-cli gave me at least 80% of the techniques and knowledge I need to create my own somewhat complex application.

response.content: Thank you so much for your kind words Greg :)
response.content_html: Thank you so much for your kind words Greg :)

results.content: Very well explained and demonstrative of the simplicity and elegance of vue. Narration 10/10 and explanation of concepts is eloquent and well presented

results.content:
I am still in the third section, but this is the first course that I watch and understand how to apply vue in a page and how it works.
The examples are very good and well explained.

results.content: I always enjoy the way Sachin teaches. He is very thorough and yet simplifies the subject in a way I believe most can understand and benefit from. This is not the first course I have taken by him and this is no exception from the others. I highly recommend taking any of his courses if it is a topic you want to learn.

response.content: Thank you so much for those kind words Michael.
